section.title: Description
section.p: This class contains the amounts and category of any payment(s) known by the pharmacy from other sources.

stentry.p: "Amount of any payment known by the pharmacy from other sources." - NCPDP Telecommunication (Field 431-DV, Data Dictionary 201104).

"Code qualifying the Other Payer Amount Paid" - NCPDP Telecommunication (Field 342-HC, Data Dictionary 201104). Possible values include: Delivery Cost; Shipping Cost; Postage Cost; Administrative Cost; Incentive; Cognitive Service; Drug Benefit; Compound Preparation Cost Submitted; Sales Tax.
